system.description:
There is a reason you are all that remains of your people. You have remembered that reason, and you're bringing that reason back.

REQUIREMENTS

To become The Ancient Secret, you have revealed or discovered a world-shaking secret.

The Ancient Secret starts with the Move What Was Once Lost.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ancient-secret.Item.NKe6RfVbnE12VcKs]{WHAT WAS ONCE LOST}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ancient-secret.Item.70lRnenBAvRzVbfg]{A DANGEROUS SECRET}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ancient-secret.Item.tJFDc2eM0o1Y1qlx]{HIDE IN PLAIN SIGHT}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ancient-secret.Item.RUUrff6EEizy75ee]{NECROMANCY}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ancient-secret.Item.x4cdCaJGcBJ1Yw8S]{TO STARE INTO THE ABYSS}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-ancient-secret.Item.oc0zJ14LLvdi4ZTw]{YOUR SECRET'S SAFE WITH ME}

advancements.name: Take the Remnant's Core Moves Feed On Pain and Inner Darkness. If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
